buzzwords.title: Redux Toolkit
buzzwords.explanation: State managment library. Simplified Redux bootstraping and usage.

buzzwords.title: Storrybook.js
buzzwords.explanation: Build react components in any way and use Storrybook.js as component explorer. You can add your documentation in your component and it will also appear in Storrybook.js.

buzzwords.title: Gatsby
buzzwords.explanation: Static site generator. This page is build with Gatsby.

buzzwords.title: redux-i18n
buzzwords.explanation: This library manages translations within the Redux state. The react components have access to the translations via the React legacy context api. This project also contains great extraction scripts for strings. Unfortunately there is no official support for the current React context api yet.

buzzwords.title: Express
buzzwords.explanation: Node.js module to create robust HTTP / REST APIs

buzzwords.title: Crow
buzzwords.explanation: Easy to use C++ micro web framework. It is very fast and includes a lot of toolings for creating great backends. It has a BSD3 license therefore it is open source. No strange static / dynamic linking restrictions.
